description: A large casino in Rainbase owned by Crocodile, serving as the public face of his operations in Arabasta. Below the casino lies a secret underground chamber with a Bananawani pool and holding cells where Crocodile imprisoned the Straw Hats.

keyEvents.title: Chopper Distracts Crocodile
keyEvents.description: Chopper bravely confronts Crocodile in Rain Dinners to buy time for Sanji's rescue operation.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Chopper's courage in the face of overwhelming danger.

keyEvents.title: Anti-Manner Kick Course Debut
keyEvents.description: Sanji debuts his powerful new technique against the Bananawani in the underground chamber of Rain Dinners.
keyEvents.significance: First appearance of one of Sanji's signature moves.

keyEvents.title: Mr. 3 Emerges with Doru Doru Ball
keyEvents.description: Mr. 3 emerges from a Bananawani in the pool at Rain Dinners, revealing his survival technique.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the defensive capabilities of the Doru Doru no Mi.

keyEvents.title: The Great Escape
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats and Smoker escape from their cage and flee the underwater chamber of Rain Dinners.
keyEvents.significance: Crucial turning point allowing the crew to continue their mission to stop the rebellion.

statusHistory.reason: Casino remains operational during this episode

description: The capital city of the Arabasta Kingdom, where the royal palace is located. The destination of the Straw Hats' desperate race to stop the rebellion and defeat Crocodile's plan.

keyEvents.title: Heading to Alubarna
keyEvents.description: After escaping Rain Dinners, the Straw Hats declare they will run non-stop to reach Alubarna.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the next phase of the Arabasta Arc - the race to the capital.
